name: The Cauldron (UltiGames)
description:
Gameplay

The Cauldron is a first person puzzle game with a unique twist - quite literally. In order to advance, you'll need to realign and rotate certain areas of the map to create new paths forward.

Plot

The player is an explorer aboard a mysterious derelict vessel known as the Cauldron which has appeared on the fringes of known space. The Cauldron seems to have been warped by an unknown spatial disturbance, re-enabling it’s dormant and deadly security systems, but also causing odd rotational effects throughout.

Controls

The Cauldron uses Mouse and Keyboard inputs exclusively.

Movement [WASD]

Jump [SPACE]

Sprint [LSHIFT]

Interact [LEFT CLICK]

Credits Development

Developed by Ulti
